name: Gift Launch
description:
Reach ten thousand metres with an uncontrollable gift/rocket frankenstein! Collect weird floating fuel canisters and repair kits, while avoiding unregistered airplanes and balloons floating above the launch centre.

This was an exercise in which I tried to make as much by myself as possible. It will be updated more once both rating periods end.

Controls

W - Boosters

S - Turn off main engine (useful for maneuvering)

A & D - Turning

Credits

  • Code by Dr.Hippo
  • BGM/SFX by Dr.Hippo with Bosca Ceoil/Bfxr
  • Art by Dr.Hippo
  • Biplane/Hot air balloon from opengameart.org (Bert-o-Naught)
  • Losing BGM from freesound.org (bloodpixelhero)
